quotes.text: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter, and those who matter don’t mind
quotes.author: Bernar

quotes.text: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter, and those who matter don’t mind
quotes.author: Bernar

quotes.text: You’ve gotta dance like there’s nobody watching, Love like you’ll never be hurt, Sing like there’s nobody listening, And live like it’s heaven on earth
quotes.author: Purkey

quotes.text: You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams
quotes.author: Seuss

quotes.text: If you want to know what a man’s like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals
quotes.author: Harry Potter
